entries.name: json_create(object)
entries.desc: Deserializes JSON string by constructing new Exception object with message m and backtrace b serialized with to_json

entries.name: as_json(*)
entries.desc: Returns a hash, that will be turned into a JSON object and represent this object.

entries.name: to_json(*args)
entries.desc: Stores class name (Exception) with message m and backtrace array b as JSON string
